channel.title: Streamlit on Tanay Kashyap
channel.description: Recent content in Streamlit on Tanay Kashyap

item.title: Python Project: Analyzing a Youtube channel using Streamlit
item.description: In this project we built a dashboard using Streamlit for analyzing a Youtube channel. We made the dashboard to analyze the entire Youtube channel as well as individual videos. After building the dashboard we also successfully published it online using Share by Streamlit feature. This is an interactive dashboard which can help you design the same for your Youtube channel. The data we used was sourced from Kaggle. We analyzed Ken Jee’s Youtube channel and presented the statistics to visualize the data.
